subject:
Re: svn commit: samba r22819 - in branches: SAMBA_3_0/source/auth
 SAMBA_3_0_25/source/auth SAMBA_3_0_26/source/auth
body:
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Volker,

> Author: vlendec
> Date: 2007-05-12 19:53:47 +0000 (Sat, 12 May 2007)
> New Revision: 22819
> 
> WebSVN: http://websvn.samba.org/cgi-bin/viewcvs.cgi?view=rev&root=samba&rev=22819
> 
> Log:
> Fix Bug 4613. We just dumped the must change & friends. With the
> pass_last_changed == 0 we now return "Change now!" instead of "Change
> never"

This looks safe to me.    How confident are you in it for inclusion in
Monday's release (considering all the cases/configurations that this
code path could be called from)?





cheers, jerry
